entry.summary: NAME is a boardgame about collecting resources to survive.

entry.title: IRC in Node
entry.content:
This project is made to find out how to properly send packets between clients completely in Node.js. It is called IRC in Node because I want to replecate the IRC protocol.

While probably not compatible it should eventually feel the same to IRC users. The project is far from finished but you can take a look at what I have so far.

Github repo
entry.summary: This project is made to find out how to properly send packets between clients completely in Node.js. It is called IRC in Node because I want to replecate the IRC protocol.

entry.title: Simple Remote Webserver (srws)
entry.content:
Simple Remote Webserver or srws is a small tool to create a remote webserver and load the given folder as if it was a real local development webserver.

This tools was created rather quickly and isn’t as optimal as I wanted it to be. I need to change express to node’s native webserver for optimal performance.

Download
entry.summary: Simple Remote Webserver or srws is a small tool to create a remote webserver and load the given folder as if it was a real local development webserver.
